members.returns: A formatted string containing the name and value.
members.summary: Gets the display value.

types.summary: A sample class for testing documentation generation.

members.name: PublicField
members.summary: A public field.

members.name: PublicMethod
members.returns: A string indicating this is a public method.
members.summary: A public method.

members.name: PublicProperty
members.summary: Gets or sets the public property.

types.name: MixedAccessClass
types.remarks: This class tests the IncludedMembers filtering functionality.
types.summary: A class with members of various access modifiers for testing filtering.

members.name: VirtualMethod
members.summary: A virtual method that can be overridden.

members.name: BaseMethod
members.summary: A method in the base class.

members.name: BaseProperty
members.signature: public virtual string BaseProperty { get; set; }
members.summary: Gets or sets the base property.

types.name: BaseClass
types.remarks: This class serves as the base for DerivedClass.
types.summary: A base class for testing inheritance documentation.

members.name: Calculate
members.signature: public int Calculate(int a, int b)
members.returns: The sum of a and b.
members.summary: Calculates the sum of two numbers.

members.name: Process
members.remarks: This method performs a simple transformation for testing purposes.
members.summary: Processes the input string.

members.name: PerformAction
members.summary: A void method that performs an action.

members.name: GetConditionalValue
members.returns: Returns "Yes" if condition is true, "No" otherwise.
members.summary: Gets a value based on a condition.

types.name: ClassWithMethods
types.examples:
var obj = new ClassWithMethods();
            var result = obj.Calculate(5, 10);
types.remarks: Contains methods with different signatures, parameters, and return types.
types.summary: A class demonstrating various method documentation scenarios.

members.name: UpdateValue
members.summary: Updates the value property.

members.name: Name
members.remarks: This is a standard public property with get and set accessors.
members.summary: Gets or sets the name.

members.name: Id
members.remarks: This property can only be read, not written to.
members.summary: Gets the read-only identifier.

members.name: Value
members.signature: public double Value { get; private set; }
members.remarks: This property can be read publicly but only set within the class.
members.summary: Gets or sets the value with a private setter.

types.name: ClassWithProperties
types.remarks: This class contains properties with different access modifiers and documentation styles.
types.summary: A class demonstrating various property documentation scenarios.

members.name: VirtualMethod
members.remarks: This method provides custom behavior for the derived class.
members.returns: A string indicating the derived implementation.
members.summary: Overrides the virtual method from the base class.

members.name: DerivedMethod
members.summary: An additional method in the derived class.

members.name: DerivedProperty
members.summary: Gets or sets the derived property.

members.name: BaseProperty
members.signature: public override string BaseProperty { get; set; }
members.remarks: This property overrides the base implementation.
members.summary: Gets or sets the base property with overridden behavior.

types.name: DerivedClass
types.examples:
var derived = new DerivedClass();
            var result = derived.VirtualMethod();
types.remarks: This class inherits from BaseClass and overrides some members.
types.summary: A derived class for testing inheritance documentation.

members.name: Dispose
members.summary: Disposes the resources used by this instance.

exceptions.description: Thrown if the object has been disposed.

members.summary: Uses the resource.

members.name: ResourceName
members.summary: Gets or sets the resource name.

types.name: DisposableClass
types.remarks: This class demonstrates how interface implementation is documented.
types.summary: A class that implements IDisposable for testing interface documentation.

members.name: DoWork
members.remarks: This method doesn't actually do anything, but it has documentation.
members.summary: Performs some work.

types.name: SimpleClass
types.remarks:
These are remarks about the SimpleClass. They provide additional context
            and information beyond what's in the summary.
types.summary: A simple class for testing basic documentation extraction.

members.name: DoSomething
members.summary: Does something.

members.name: Name
members.summary: Gets or sets the name.

members.name: MethodWithSpecialChars
members.summary: A method with special characters in docs: <T> generics.

types.name: ClassWithSpecialCharacters
types.remarks:
This tests handling of XML special characters like <tag> and &entity;.
            Also tests "quotes" and 'apostrophes'.
types.summary: A class with special characters in documentation: <, >, &, ", '.

members.name: ComplexMethod

parameters.name: number
parameters.usage: The number to use in processing.

members.signature: public string ComplexMethod(string text, int number)
members.remarks: This method performs complex processing.First, it validates the input.Then, it processes the data.Finally, it returns the result.
members.summary: A complex method with full documentation.

members.name: Value
members.summary: Gets or sets the value property.
members.value: The current value as a string.

types.name: ClassWithFullDocs
types.remarks: This class demonstrates all available XML documentation tags.It includes multiple paragraphs in the remarks section.
types.summary: A class with comprehensive XML documentation tags.

members.name: MethodWithOptionalParam

parameters.name: optional
parameters.usage: The optional integer parameter with a default value.

members.signature: public string MethodWithOptionalParam(string required, int optional = 42)
members.examples:
var result1 = MethodWithOptionalParam("test");      // Uses default value 42
            var result2 = MethodWithOptionalParam("test", 100); // Uses provided value
members.returns: A formatted string combining both parameters.
members.summary: A method with an optional parameter.

members.name: MethodWithParams
members.examples:
var sum1 = MethodWithParams(1, 2, 3);        // Returns 6
            var sum2 = MethodWithParams(new[] { 1, 2 }); // Returns 3
members.returns: The sum of all provided values.
members.summary: A method with a params array.

members.name: MethodWithRef

parameters.name: value
parameters.usage: The value to be modified by reference.

members.remarks: This method doubles the input value.
members.summary: A method with a ref parameter.

members.name: MethodWithOut

parameters.name: value
parameters.usage: The output integer value if parsing succeeds.

members.signature: public bool MethodWithOut(string input, out int value)
members.returns: true if the parsing was successful; otherwise, false.
members.summary: A method with an out parameter.

members.name: GenericMethod
members.examples:
var result1 = GenericMethod<int>(42);
            var result2 = GenericMethod("hello");
members.returns: The string representation of the value.
members.summary: A generic method with a type parameter.

members.name: GenericMethodWithMultipleTypes
members.signature: public System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> GenericMethodWithMultipleTypes<TKey, TValue>(TKey key, TValue value)
members.summary: A method with multiple generic type parameters.

members.name: MethodWithNullables
members.signature: public string MethodWithNullables(System.Nullable<int> nullableInt, string nullableString)
members.returns: A description of the provided values.
members.summary: A method with nullable parameters.

members.name: MethodWithConstraints
members.signature: public string MethodWithConstraints<T>(T item) where T : class
members.returns: The type name of the item.
members.summary: A method demonstrating parameter constraints.

typeParameters.description: The type parameter constrained to class types.
typeParameters.name: T

types.name: ParameterVariations
types.remarks: This class contains methods with different parameter modifiers and types.
types.summary: A class demonstrating various parameter types and patterns.
